descr_WRONGANSWER.en: The answer you provided did not match. Try again, or contact the administrators!

descr_WRONGUSERPASS.en: Unable to login, please check username or password.

descr_ACCOUNTLOCKED.en: This account has been locked due to too many invalid login attempts. Please contact  IT Client services helpdesk to unlock the account!

descr_2FAILEDATTEMPTWARNING.en: Account will be locked after 2 more failed attempts.

descr_1FAILEDATTEMPTWARNING.en: Acount will be locked after 1 more failed attempt.

descr_INVALIDQUESTIONANSWERS.en: Please check that all answer and questions are different from each other.

descr_SHORTQUESTIONANSWERS.en: One or more of the answers you provided does not meet the minimum length requirements imposed by your administrator. Please revise your answers or choose other questions.

descr_EMPTYQUESTIONS.en: Please populate the database with questions.

descr_INCOMPLETEQUESTIONS.en: Please enter answers for more questions

descr_CODEXPIRED.en: A new code has been sent to you via email.

descr_CODEINVALID.en: Please check the code again, or request a new one.
